lines.text: Come nearer. Let me look at you. Come close. Look at me. You aren't afraid of a woman who has never seen the sun since before you were born?
Take nothing on its looks, take everything on evidence. There is no better rule.
If that boy comes back 'ere with his 'ead blown to bits by a musket, don't look to me to put it together again!

[narrating]
In trying to become a gentleman, I had succeeded in becoming a snob.
Keep still, you young devil, or I'll slit your throat!
Pip! A young gentleman of great expectations.
I have a pretty large experience of boys and you're a bad lot of fellows.
